html:
2026-0137
2026-02-13PS, TCPreclearance Act, 2016Regulations Amending the Preclearance in Canada RegulationsRegulations Amending the Preclearance in Canada Regulations in order to (1) establish the requirements for new preclearance security access, including eligibility criteria, applicant information requirements, border-security-related factors the Minister must consider, and processes for the suspension and revocation of a clearance; and 2) create schedules listing offences that automatically disqualify an applicant from obtaining a clearance if they have been convicted, within the previous five years of an offence listed in Schedule I or within the previous ten years of an offence listed in Schedule II.Registration: SOR/2026-0025 Publication Date: 2026-02-25
subject: Regulations Amending the Preclearance in Canada Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Preclearance in Canada Regulations in order to (1) establish the requirements for new preclearance security access, including eligibility criteria, applicant information requirements, border-security-related factors the Minister must consider, and processes for the suspension and revocation of a clearance; and 2) create schedules listing offences that automatically disqualify an applicant from obtaining a clearance if they have been convicted, within the previous five years of an offence listed in Schedule I or within the previous ten years of an offence listed in Schedule II.
